# ECoFarchive

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

This repository serves as the [Eschmeyer's Catalog of Fishes](https://research.calacademy.org/research/ichthyology/catalog/fishcatmain.asp) archive accessed through the `fishrfun` R package (currently in development).
